name: cryptogain
description: A simple desktop app to keep an eye on your crypto currencies

scripts.buildwin32: electron-packager . CryptoGain --prune --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --overwrite --asar=true --icon=app/img/icon_app.ico --version-string.CompanyName="JeffProd.com" --version-string.ProductName="CryptoGain" --version-string.FileDescription="Keep an eye on your crypto currencies" --appCopyright="(c) 2017 JeffProd.com" --ignore=\.idea --ignore=\.vscode
scripts.buildwin64: electron-packager . CryptoGain --prune --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --overwrite --asar=true --icon=app/img/icon_app.ico --version-string.CompanyName="JeffProd.com" --version-string.ProductName="CryptoGain" --version-string.FileDescription="Keep an eye on your crypto currencies" --appCopyright="(c) 2017 JeffProd.com" --ignore=\.idea --ignore=\.vscode

author: @JeffProd
